sentences.sentence: For that one moment, he dropped his silliness and spoke with dignity.
sentences.translation: 在那一刻，他放下了他的愚蠢，有尊严地说话。

sentences.sentence: Adding laughter and silliness to your life will be a game changer.
sentences.translation: 在你生活里加入爆笑点和傻气能改变你的游戏。

sentences.sentence: It will make everyone laugh but also point out the silliness of the situation.
sentences.translation: 这不仅让在座的人会心一笑，同时也指出了这情形有多愚蠢。
